Shahrukh Khan and Gauri have shown the world that if you are dedicated to each other nothing can come in between your love. We bring to you a beautiful candid picture of Shahrukh with Gauri's family.We all know that Shahrukh Khan and Gauri faced many troubles before marriage because of their different religion. Gauri's parents were against this marriage because Shahrukh was a Muslim. But as they say love conquers all, Shahrukh won Gauri's parents's heart and convinced them for this marriage. And finally on October 25th, King Khan tied the knot with Gauri. Was Deepika Padukone In Depression Because of Her Boyfriend? Talking about his beautiful wife Gauri Khan, Shahrukh Khan had once said in a candid chat that why he loves Gauri so much, '' I feel a sense of calmness with her, she's my queen. She's very real, I'm an actor because I don't like being Shahrukh, she is Gauri because she loves to be Gauri.''Shahrukh Khan further added,''Everyone is like actors are not supposed to be like this or that, the only reason I stick to her is because I don't want to be responsible for taking this peace away from her. I just don't want this calmness to be destroyed by me.''
